title: The President of the Republic receives the credentials of four new ambassadors
text: The President of the Republic, Mr. Abdelmadjid Tebboune, received Wednesday the credentials of four new ambassadors approved to Algeria.

The new ambassadors are: Her Excellency the Ambassador of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, Mrs. Sharon Wardle, Her Excellency the Ambassador of the Republic of India, Mr. Gaurav Ahluwalia, Her Excellency the 'Ambassador of the Republic of Cameroon, Mr. Komidor Hamidou Njimoluh and His Excellency the Ambassador of the Republic of Senegal, Mr. Serene Diyay.

The credentials ceremony took place at the seat of the Presidency of the Republic, in the presence of the Director of the Cabinet at the Presidency of the Republic, Mr. Noureddine Baghdad Daidj and the Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr. Sabri Boukadoum.
